Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.amazon.device.associates

Interface Summary
LinkService This interface provides methods for developers to build links to Amazon products and allow shopping in a browser upon a user action.
ShoppingListener You must create a class implementing the ShoppingListener and register an instance of this class with ShoppingService.setListener(ShoppingListener) before using other APIs in the ShoppingService.
ShoppingService ShoppingService class is the primary class for integrating Amazon Shopping Experience to your app.
 

Class Summary
AssociatesAPI This class initializes the Mobile Associates API, and prepares it for use in your app.
AssociatesAPI.Config This class is used to provide the API configuration to AssociatesAPI.initialize(com.amazon.device.associates.AssociatesAPI.Config).
Image Represents the product image.
Offset An Offset is used in the ReceiptsRequest constructor to specify the starting point for retrieving the receipts.
OpenHomePageRequest Object of OpenHomePageRequest is passed to LinkService.openRetailPage(OpenRetailPageRequest) to build a link to the Amazon retail web.
OpenProductPageRequest Object of OpenProductPageRequest is passed to LinkService.openRetailPage(com.amazon.device.associates.OpenRetailPageRequest) to build a link to the Amazon retail web.
OpenRetailPageRequest Base class for all LinkService.openRetailPage(com.amazon.device.associates.OpenRetailPageRequest) request classes.
OpenSearchPageRequest Object of OpenSearchPageRequest is passed to LinkService.openRetailPage(com.amazon.device.associates.OpenRetailPageRequest) to build a link to amazon retail search page with products in Amazon product catalog using keywords and category.
Price Represents the price of a product.
Product Represents a physical product in Amazon Catalog.
PurchaseRequest A object of PurchaseRequest object is passed to ShoppingService.purchase(PurchaseRequest) to initiate a purchase.
PurchaseResponse PurchaseResponse is returned in ShoppingListener.onPurchaseResponse(PurchaseResponse).
Receipt Represents the receipt for the purchase of a product.
ReceiptsRequest ReceiptsRequest object is passed in ShoppingService.getReceipts(ReceiptsRequest) to initiate the request for retrieving the receipts for past purchases.
ReceiptsResponse ReceiptsResponse is returned in the ShoppingListener.onReceiptsResponse(ReceiptsResponse) callback.
RequestId It represents the ID of each request made via ShoppingService.
ResponseReceiver You must register this class as an Android broadcast receiver using a receiver tag in your AndroidManifest.xml.
SearchByIdRequest Represents a request to lookup products in the Amazon product catalog using a product ID.
SearchByIdResponse SearchByIdResponse is returned in the ShoppingListener.onSearchByIdResponse(SearchByIdResponse) callback.
SearchRequest Represents a request to search for products in the Amazon product catalog using keywords or categories.
SearchResponse SearchResponse is returned in the ShoppingListener.onSearchResponse(SearchResponse) callback.
ServiceStatusResponse ServiceStatusResponse is returned in the ShoppingListener.onServiceStatusResponse(ServiceStatusResponse) callback.
ShoppingServiceRequest Base class for all ShoppingService request classes.
ShoppingServiceResponse Base class for all ShoppingService response classes.
UserData This Class represents currently logged in Amazon user.
 

Enum Summary
FilterType Represents search filters that can be passed to the ShoppingService.search(SearchRequest) method via SearchRequest.
PurchaseExperience Represents different purchase experiences the ShoppingService.purchase(PurchaseRequest) API provides.
PurchaseResponse.Status Represents the status of the corresponding purchase request
ReceiptsResponse.Status Represents the status of the corresponding getReceipts request
SearchByIdResponse.Status Represents the status of the corresponding search request.
SearchResponse.Status Represents the status of the corresponding search request.
SortType Represents a type of sort that can be passed to ShoppingService.search(SearchRequest) calls.
 

Exception Summary
NoListenerException Thrown when ShoppingService API is called before the ShoppingListener is set.
NotInitializedException Thrown when an AssociatesAPI methods is called before AssociatesAPI.initialize(com.amazon.device.associates.AssociatesAPI.Config) is called.
